labels.name: story
labels.value: Navigate to QA Jobs and verify lever pages

description:
For each location in JSON (e.g., Istanbul, Turkiye and Berlin, Germany):
1. Open QA jobs listing (team=Quality Assurance)
2. Apply location filter
3. Validate first job card layout
4. Open detail (via Apply button) and compare header vs listing
5. Click 'Apply for this job' and validate apply page header & 'Submit your application' form
